Superior colliculus stellate cell of the.Synonym: stellate cell of the zone of optic fibers
Superior colliculus stellate cell of the.Title: The upper layers of the superior colliculus of the rat: a Golgi study.
Superior colliculus stellate cell of the.EditorialNote: Appended Superior colliculus to name given by contributor to conform to Neurolex NIF naming conventions;  removed parenthetical phrase and inserted into regional part of name
Superior colliculus stellate cell of the.Definition: Collator note: this cell type is not explicitly defined, but is considered here as distinct, based on the definition of the stellate cells class (category) and Table 1 page 407.
